name: SLAMSHOT
description:
Shoot the puck into the opponents goal, charge your shot to initiate a slam shot. 

controller   recommended  brother

Controllers

Dpad: Move

B: Shoot (hold to charge)

A: Jump

Keyboard 1P

Arrows: move

Z: Shoot (hold to charge)

X or Space: Jump

Keyboard 2P

Arrows and WASD control  each player

Side: Move

Down: Shoot (hold to charge)

Up: Jump
